entry.title: Setup Android Studio for Pentesting
entry.summary: Summary This guide will describe how to set up a test device and install the tools necessary to perform Android Security Assessments using Android Studio. Install and Configure Android Studio Download and Install Android Studio Add the following to your $PATH: $HOME/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools $HOME/Library/Android/sdk/emulator $HOME/Library/Android/sdk/build-tools/INSERT_VERSION...
